text: At Harvard Business School, we educate
leaders who make a difference in the world today.

We can help even more leaders
make an even bigger difference
by multiplying our world leading education with the power of AI.

One of our first virtual
AI powered tutor bots,
designed and built by HBS.

It knows what others
don't because it's built on decades
of our proprietary knowledge and pedagogy.

It can help with more
than just answering questions
like understanding course content.
Applying course concepts to the real world
and giving real time feedback

so students can find all the answers
all in one place.

But don't worry, it makes your life
easier too, because this tutor bot
is also a bot that can do the most time consuming parts of your job
in seconds.
You can see what students are asking
so you can meet them where they are.

Best of all, it's not just built
for Harvard Business School.
It's built by Harvard Business School.
Modular by design, it's easily adaptable

to any course,
any teaching method, in any environment.

Our vision is to give every student,
professor NTA,
their own tutor bot one course at a time.
Because the more tutor bots we connect,
the more powerful our platform becomes.

Building our world
leading education at scale.

To help even readers
make an even bigger difference.

This is AI,
the Harvard Business School way.
